title: Creating Ranked Team for Bronze 3+
body:
I was ranked Silver 3 last season and I main Support and Adc, looking for people who aren't to serious. Skype not nessacary. Add me IGN: Pizza Sub or comment. 


ty

replies.body:
Im looking for a team. silver 2 at the moment on my main acc (kfuntez) 
main tanky frontliners across a support jungle or top role.. hit me up on both kfuntez and ogstarz89

Hey, im keen to play on your team as well, B3 at the moment just climbing. 
love some fun, i play all roles well
support: thresh, sona, volibear
jungle: volibear, ekko, olaf.
mid: ekko, LeBish ;), Brand, Ezreal.
last season was adc main so i pretty much play any adc real well, except a few i don't own on this account
and top is not my best lane, unless im a carry role. :)
Hit me up if you're interested and still need some players ~ SgtPuffles.
Hi there, I main jungle. B3 atm. Looking to join a fun nit so serious, play to get better team. Summoner name, septicshock. Carry in jungle if I get sejuani lol.
Plat 5 last season, gold 2 atm, main top/support can play all meta picks well
I'm B4, was S3 last season but yeh, anyway, i carry most ADC games i get plus large champ pool.
Gold 5 Mid main, Looking to play some R5's with people for a bit of fun, maybe we can get somewhere with it too~
Im B3 always shifting to b1 and back. i play a mean {{champion:98}} jungle/top i would like to play with you

My friend and I are looking for a team. I'm currently S5, he's B2. He's a great ADC & Top. I'm a great Support and Mid.
Would be keen.
